enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve modifying the internal state of the composite collection by adding or retaining elements.
Both methods modify the internal state of the composite collection by removing elements, albeit with different criteria.
Both methods involve checking the presence of elements in the composite collection, which can inform the construction of assertions for retainAll.
The size of the composite collection can be used to verify the effect of retainAll, ensuring that the correct number of elements are retained.
